files.README.md:
## Installation

- **Skills CLI**: `npx skills add 2ykwang/agent-skills`
- **Plugin Marketplace**: `claude plugin marketplace add 2ykwang/agent-skills`

---

| Skill | |
|---|---|
| [django-ticket-triage](skills/django-ticket-triage) | Analyze a Django Trac ticket and produce a triage recommendation report. |
| | `npx skills add 2ykwang/agent-skills --skill django-ticket-triage` |
| | `claude plugin install django-ticket-triage@2ykwang-agent-skills` |
| [html-visual](skills/html-visual) | Generate interactive single-file HTML visualizations â€” UI mockups, ERDs, flowcharts, data charts. |
| | `npx skills add 2ykwang/agent-skills --skill html-visual` |
| | `claude plugin install html-visual@2ykwang-agent-skills` |
| [ralph-loop-template](skills/ralph-loop-template) | Generate Ralph Loop iteration checklists from plan files. Creates `PROMPT-*.md` files ready for `/ralph-loop`. |
| | `npx skills add 2ykwang/agent-skills --skill ralph-loop-template` |
| | `claude plugin install ralph-loop-template@2ykwang-agent-skills` |

files.plugins/django-ticket-triage/README.md:
# django-ticket-triage

Analyze a Django Trac ticket and produce a triage recommendation report.

## Installation

### Claude Code

```bash
claude plugin marketplace add 2ykwang/agent-skills
claude plugin install django-ticket-triage@2ykwang-agent-skills
```

### npx skills

```bash
npx skills add 2ykwang/agent-skills --skill django-ticket-triage
```

---

> Auto-generated from [skills/django-ticket-triage](../../skills/django-ticket-triage).
files.plugins/html-visual/README.md:
# html-visual

Generate an interactive single-file HTML visualization (mockup, wireframe, ERD, flowchart, chart, slides, architecture diagram, dashboard, timeline, mindmap, kanban, table).

## Installation

### Claude Code

```bash
claude plugin marketplace add 2ykwang/agent-skills
claude plugin install html-visual@2ykwang-agent-skills
```

### npx skills

```bash
npx skills add 2ykwang/agent-skills --skill html-visual
```

---

files.plugins/ralph-loop-template/README.md:
# ralph-loop-template

Generates iterable checklist PROMPT files for Ralph Loop from plan files or current context, and provides the /ralph-loop execution command.

## Requires

- [ralph-wiggum](https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code/tree/main/plugins/ralph-wiggum)

## Installation

### Claude Code

```bash
claude plugin marketplace add 2ykwang/agent-skills
claude plugin install ralph-loop-template@2ykwang-agent-skills
```

### npx skills

```bash
npx skills add 2ykwang/agent-skills --skill ralph-loop-template
```

---

> Auto-generated from [skills/ralph-loop-template](../../skills/ralph-loop-template).
